name: Sanji
text:
When this Character is K.O'd by an opponent's effect, look at the top 5 cards of your deck and play up to 1 Character card with the type (Straw Hat Crew) and a cost of 5 or less. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
On Play: Return up to 1 Character with an original power of 5000 or less to the owner's hand.

effect.text: Return up to 1 Character with an original power of 5000 or less to the owner's hand.
